snippet: “Kindergarten,” a group show at Ricco Maresca Gallery, experiments with color, shape and pattern in the fashion set out by the 19th-century German educator Friedrich Froebel.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews group exhibit Kindergarten at Ricco Maresca Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “Kindergarten,” a group show at Ricco Maresca Gallery, experiments with color, shape and pattern in the fashion set out by the 19th-century German educator Friedrich Froebel.
